name: Candace
title: Golden Vow: Candace
desc: The crimson sand flows, an oath to defend.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Candace to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
skills.desc: Attaches a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Heron Shield to this character and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">prepares <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Heron Strike.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG and creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Prayer of the Crimson Crown.
